scripts.install:submodules: pnpm run install:zig3-soroswap && pnpm run install:nathan_project && pnpm run install:Core && pnpm run install:Frontend && pnpm run install:Backend && pnpm run install:Passkey-kit && pnpm run install:tailwind-firebase-nextjs-referral-system
scripts.install:zig3-soroswap: cd zig3-soroswap && nvm use 18.17.0 && yarn install
scripts.install:nathan_project: cd nathan_project && nvm use 19.0.1 && npm install
scripts.install:Core: cd Core && nvm use 18.17.0 && yarn install
scripts.install:Frontend: cd Frontend && nvm use 18.17.0 && yarn install
scripts.install:Backend: cd Backend && nvm use 18.17.0 && yarn install
scripts.install:Passkey-kit: cd Passkey-kit && nvm use 20.0.0 && yarn install
scripts.install:tailwind-firebase-nextjs-referra: cd tailwind-firebase-nextjs-referral-system && nvm use 18.17.0 && yarn install
